resources.string: Video replay functionality will not work without location access.
Video replay functionality will not work without accurate location access.
Location settings on your device are not satisfying the needs of this app. Video replay functionality will not work.
Something is wrong with your gyroscope. Seeking video and volume control will not work.
Something is wrong with your accelerometer. Video pause by shaking will not work.
Something went wrong and some of the functionality may work not properly.
